headline: Tell HN: If You Are in Russia
description:
Every Russian citizen and every Russian company that is currently relying on businesses in the West such as Amazon, Google, Microsoft and so on for hosting, connectivity and services should expect those services to be cut off at some point in the near future, and plan accordingly.

Regardless, you won't be able to pay for these services at the next billing period so they will be terminated one way or another.

Back up your stuff, move your service while you can or you risk losing everything.

Understand that the level at which this is currently playing out means that it could very well happen that governments will sanction businesses in the West that continue to work with Russian entities, businesses or individuals.

Some may decide to do this unilaterally for reasons all their own, some may give you warnings, some won't.

Use the time while you have it. And I hope sincerely that all of this will be behind us soon and in a way that minimizes bloodshed on both sides, but I especially wish that for the defenders, who had no agency at all.
description_zh-Hans:
每一个俄罗斯公民和每一个目前依靠西方企业，如亚马逊、谷歌、微软等提供托管、连接和服务的俄罗斯公司，都应该预期这些服务会在不久的将来的某个时刻被切断，并制定相应的计划。

无论如何，你将无法在下一个账单期支付这些服务，所以它们将以某种方式被终止。

Back up your stuff, move your service while you can or you risk losing everything.

Understand that the level at which this is currently playing out means that it could very well happen that governments will sanction businesses in the West that continue to work with Russian entities, businesses or individuals.

Some may decide to do this unilaterally for reasons all their own, some may give you warnings, some won't.

Use the time while you have it. And I hope sincerely that all of this will be behind us soon and in a way that minimizes bloodshed on both sides, but I especially wish that for the defenders, who had no agency at all.
description_zh-Hant:
每一個俄羅斯公民和每一個目前依靠西方企業，如亞馬遜、谷歌、微軟等提供託管、連接和服務的俄羅斯公司，都應該預期這些服務會在不久的將來的某個時刻被切斷，並制定相應的計劃。

無論如何，你將無法在下一個賬單期支付這些服務，所以它們將以某種方式被終止。

Back up your stuff, move your service while you can or you risk losing everything.

Understand that the level at which this is currently playing out means that it could very well happen that governments will sanction businesses in the West that continue to work with Russian entities, businesses or individuals.

Some may decide to do this unilaterally for reasons all their own, some may give you warnings, some won't.

Use the time while you have it. And I hope sincerely that all of this will be behind us soon and in a way that minimizes bloodshed on both sides, but I especially wish that for the defenders, who had no agency at all.
